comments.body: I am not sure about moving the code here. Generally speaking, `util` should be used for generic functions and stucts that are used by multiple components. In this case, I think the code belongs to the scheduling queue as it is the only place that uses this code.

Never mind my previous comment. I saw that the backoff util now uses Heap. I think we should consider adopting Heap unittests from https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/staging/src/k8s.io/client-go/tools/cache/heap_test.go

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@type KeyFunc func(obj interface{}) (string, error)

type heapItem struct {
	obj   interface{} // The object which is stored in the heap.
	index int         // The index of the object's key in the Heap.queue.
